page.title: 11RECREATION
page.content:
There many different things to do in Conwy They are:-{Bowling Greens& Snooker {Halls}.There is a B.G.at Conwy(Morfa Bach)and one at the Memorial Institute at Llandudno Junction(on Penrhos Ave.) (Bowls can be rented) { Tennis courts & Parks There are 4 courts in Conwy at Bodlodeb Park.There are also 2 parks in Llandudno Junction,1 in Conwy,1 in Gufin and 1in PenGarth. { Cinwmas & Bingo} There is one cinema ic Conwy(Palace). Bingo is also held here on Tues-Sat. nights.It's also held on Monday nights at the Memorial Institute in Llandudno Junction (on Penrhos Ave.).
By Alwyn Trinder
